overview.title: Overview
overview.hoverHint: Hover a slot to preview details.
overview.emptyHint: [EMPTY] No samples yet. Double-click a slot to add your first entry.
overview.helpText:
Overview Panel - LN2 Tank Visualization

This panel shows a visual map of your liquid nitrogen storage tanks.

BASIC OPERATIONS:
- Single-click a slot to preview details below
- Double-click a slot to auto-prefill Add Entry; if occupied, also prefill Takeout
- Right-click a slot for detailed actions (takeout/move/query/add)
- Drag an occupied slot onto another slot to stage a Move in the Plan Queue
- Empty slots show position numbers (1-81)
- Occupied slots show record IDs with color-coded status

COLOR CODING:
- Green: Active samples (ready for use)
- Yellow: Recently thawed samples
- Red: Depleted/discarded samples
- Gray: Empty positions

QUICK ACTIONS:
- Quick Add: Jump to add new sample form

operations.title: Operations
operations.helpText:
Operations Panel - Manual Actions

This panel provides forms for common inventory operations.

MODES:
- Takeout: Remove/thaw samples from storage
- Move: Relocate samples within or between boxes
- Add Entry: Register new frozen samples
- Plan Queue: Review staged operations (always visible below)
- Query: Search and filter inventory data
- Rollback: Restore from backup files
- Audit Log: View operation history

WORKFLOW:
1. Select operation mode from dropdown
2. Fill in required fields (IDs, positions, etc.)
3. Click "Add to Plan" to stage the operation
4. Review staged items in the always-visible Plan Queue
5. Click "Execute All" to apply changes

BATCH OPERATIONS:
- Enter multiple positions separated by commas (e.g., "1,2,3-5")
- Batch APIs stay available via AI/automation (batch controls are hidden in manual UI)

TIPS:
- Hover over fields for hints
- Check the Plan Queue before executing
- Use Undo within 10 seconds to reverse mistakes
operations.emptyPlan:
[EMPTY] No operations staged yet.

Ways to add operations:
1. Double-click a cell in Overview panel
2. Use the Takeout/Move/Add forms above
3. Ask the AI Assistant to generate a plan

operations.planMoveDown: Moved selected plan block down by 1.

operations.planRejectedRollbackExisting: Plan rejected: Plan already contains Rollback (clear Plan first).

operations.noRollbackBackup: No rollback backup found for this execution.
operations.executionRolledBack: Execution failed; rolled back all changes.
operations.planExecutionAtomicRollback: Rejected atomically: {fail}/{total} failed; rollback restored state (0 applied).

operations.noPlanToPrint: No plan or recent execution to print.

operations.planPrintOpened: Plan operation sheet opened in browser.

operations.noPrintableFromSelection: Selected audit rows produced no printable operations
operations.noPrintableAuditGuide: No printable guide generated from selected audit rows.

ai.title: AI Copilot
ai.placeholder: Type a natural-language request... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for newline)
ai.reportPlaceholder: Structured agent output will appear here.
ai.helpText:
AI Assistant Panel - Natural Language Operations

This panel lets you control inventory using natural language commands.

SETUP:
1. Configure your DeepSeek API key in Settings
2. Select model and max steps in "Show Advanced"

USAGE:
Type requests in plain language, for example:
- "Show me all K562 samples"
- "Move sample 5 to position 10 in box 2"
- "How many empty slots in box 1?"
- "Thaw samples at positions 1, 2, and 3"

HOW IT WORKS:
1. AI analyzes your request
2. Generates a plan of operations
3. Plan items appear in Operations panel
4. Review and execute from the Plan Queue

TIPS:
- Be specific about box numbers and positions
- Use record IDs when referring to samples
- Check generated plans before executing
